channel.title: *~^ButterScape v3 95%!^~*
channel.description:
[b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b] *40% ButtersScape Client/Source? *60% Me -------------------------------------------------------------------------- so, as you know i earlier posted my butterscape v2, unfinished..and i just now finally got around to finishing it. i think a lot of people will like it, i spent a lot of hard work on this, so some of the features are.. -------------------------------------------------------------------------- *[b]NEW[/b]* NEW home..i decided to mvoe it into the middle of nowhere :D!!! it was a lot of space where i could add a BUNCH of objects, NPC's and what not. i think you'll like it more than the same old edge home..
*[b]NEW[/b]* in the old butterscape, cocoas and mine, the GrandExchange is a bank deposit box..i changed it to a custom made bank booth, thanks to the power of www.google.com!
*[b]NEW[/b]* Added custom cracken area, he's in the water and attacks using magic spells. so grab you're team, do ::cracken, and go kick some ass ;)
*same godwars, took out my old gay godwars count thing, just made it so you enter the porals.
*made a custom pk box thing ;D
*made a custom training
*added my first custom NPC: moparisthebest :D!!
*[b]NEW[/b]* Dagganoth area, in the ACUTAL area.
*Added somewhat of a lootshare, you get auto-teled out of the dagg's place, and get either a hilt, draogn lump, etc..
*no SHITTY ass lunars, dragon claws, statius, or any of that shit, just a regular 317 with ONLY ancients..FTW!
*[b]NEW[/b]* Added Tormented deamon, drops dragon shard pieces, use them on eachother to get [s]"DRAGON PLATEBODY!!"[/s] like i said, no more shitty items like that, you get::::: Lava armour :)!
**52% summoning - just need to add the ints for items, charms, obelisk..ETC. ------------------------------------------------------ additional info||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| ------------------------------------------------------ when you equip you're ancients staff, you automatically turn to ancients.. ------------------------------------------------------ now, i know a lot of people don't like customs, but i felt like it would be 'leeching' if i deleted them, so here it an item list of EVERY single custom item in butterscape v1,v2[mine], and my v3 :)
[code]15082 = owners platebody 15064 = bandos platelegs 15007 = top hat 4762 = ghostly torag legs 4763 = ghostly torag plate 4764 = ghostly torag hammers 16043 = butters robe top 15044 = butters robe bottom 15962 = santas robe top 15963 = santas robe bottom 15968 = gilded robe top 15969 = gilded robe bottom 15009 = green platelegs 15010 = green shield 15011 = green gauntlets 15012 = green botts 13776 = lunar helm 17001 = master strength cape 17002 = master hunter cape 17003 = master attack cape 17004 = master cooking cape 17005 = master defence cape 15083 = owners platelegs 15084 = owner boots 15956 = blue boots 15957 = elf boots 15932 = gilded bandos chestplate 16031 = bandos blackchest 15939 = lemonlime chestplate 15949 = green brassy 15970 = dragon brassard 15950 = elf's brassard 15951 = blue brassard 15086 = owners crown 16038 = angel wings 11334 = sniper rifle 11335 = rocket launcher 11337 = plasma rifle 11333 = tri-godsword 11339 = saradomin godsword(dual) 11336 = guthix godsword 11330 = car 11329 = butters car 11331 = god dagger 11338 = energy sword 16039 = dragon kiteshield 16040 = fancy shirt 16041 = dmeon wings 15085 = owners kiteshield 15928 = michigan platelegs 15929 = jet's platelegs 13777 = lunar torso 13778 = lunar legs 13779 = lunar gauntlets 13780 = lunar boots 13781 = lunar cape 13674 = lunar staff 15087 = guthans ghostly legs 15088 = guthans ghostly helm 11328 = halo helmet 15089 = guthans ghostly platebody [/code]
their's a ton more, just didn't feel like going through my class8.java
going to post download link, as well as pictures, once i finish it. so you're problay going to post bad comments, but you'll like it with pic's, i'll release it by tommrow :))))))
proof for cocoa -.-
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/proof-Copy.jpg[/img]

item.title: *~^ButterScape v3 95%!^~*
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

if u need cocos permission then why did he release source and client der dumb fucks

item.title: *~^ButterScape v3 95%!^~*
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

cocoa:

I wanted you to change the name from Butterscape -.-

to…>.^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2009, 12:37:57 am[/size][hr][quote=“Zh, post:21, topic:287952”][quote author=ModAssassin link=topic=380709.msg2861527#msg2861527 date=1247195946]
CREDITS
*40% ButtersScape Client/Source?
*60% Me

so, as you know i earlier posted my butterscape v2, unfinished…and i just now finally got around to finishing it. i think a lot of people will like it, i spent a lot of hard work on this, so some of the features are…

NEW NEW home…i decided to mvoe it into the middle of nowhere :D!!! it was a lot of space where i could add a BUNCH of objects, NPC’s and what not. i think you’ll like it more than the same old edge home…

NEW in the old butterscape, cocoas and mine, the GrandExchange is a bank deposit box…i changed it to a custom made bank booth, thanks to the power of www.google.com!

NEW Added custom cracken area, he’s in the water and attacks using magic spells. so grab you’re team, do ::cracken, and go kick some ass

*same godwars, took out my old gay godwars count thing, just made it so you enter the porals.

*made a custom pk box thing ;D

*made a custom training

*added my first custom NPC: moparisthebest :D!!

NEW Dagganoth area, in the ACUTAL area.

*Added somewhat of a lootshare, you get auto-teled out of the dagg’s place, and get either a hilt, draogn lump, etc…

*no SHITTY ass lunars, dragon claws, statius, or any of that shit, just a regular 317 with ONLY ancients…FTW!

NEW
Added Tormented deamon, drops dragon shard pieces, use them on eachother to get “DRAGON PLATEBODY!!” like i said, no more shitty items like that, you get::::: Lava armour :)!

**52% summoning - just need to add the ints for items, charms, obelisk…ETC.

additional info|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

when you equip you’re ancients staff, you automatically turn to ancients…

now, i know a lot of people don’t like customs, but i felt like it would be ‘leeching’ if i deleted them, so here it an item list of EVERY single custom item in butterscape v1,v2[mine], and my v3

15082 = owners platebody 15064 = bandos platelegs 15007 = top hat 4762 = ghostly torag legs 4763 = ghostly torag plate 4764 = ghostly torag hammers 16043 = butters robe top 15044 = butters robe bottom 15962 = santas robe top 15963 = santas robe bottom 15968 = gilded robe top 15969 = gilded robe bottom 15009 = green platelegs 15010 = green shield 15011 = green gauntlets 15012 = green botts 13776 = lunar helm 17001 = master strength cape 17002 = master hunter cape 17003 = master attack cape 17004 = master cooking cape 17005 = master defence cape 15083 = owners platelegs 15084 = owner boots 15956 = blue boots 15957 = elf boots 15932 = gilded bandos chestplate 16031 = bandos blackchest 15939 = lemonlime chestplate 15949 = green brassy 15970 = dragon brassard 15950 = elf's brassard 15951 = blue brassard 15086 = owners crown 16038 = angel wings 11334 = sniper rifle 11335 = rocket launcher 11337 = plasma rifle 11333 = tri-godsword 11339 = saradomin godsword(dual) 11336 = guthix godsword 11330 = car 11329 = butters car 11331 = god dagger 11338 = energy sword 16039 = dragon kiteshield 16040 = fancy shirt 16041 = dmeon wings 15085 = owners kiteshield 15928 = michigan platelegs 15929 = jet's platelegs 13777 = lunar torso 13778 = lunar legs 13779 = lunar gauntlets 13780 = lunar boots 13781 = lunar cape 13674 = lunar staff 15087 = guthans ghostly legs 15088 = guthans ghostly helm 11328 = halo helmet 15089 = guthans ghostly platebody

their’s a ton more, just didn’t feel like going through my class8.java

going to post download link, as well as pictures, once i finish it. so you’re problay going to post bad comments, but you’ll like it with pic’s, i’ll release it by tommrow :))))))

proof for cocoa -.-

[/quote]
Please gtfo, you’re a noob leecher. Btw you didn’t edit like anything. Only reason you “Didn’t put your name all over it” was because you don’t know how even. So just please suck my left nut.[/quote]

lol??? nerd…g’]['fo.

Read full topic

15082 = owners platebody 15064 = bandos platelegs 15007 = top hat 4762 = ghostly torag legs 4763 = ghostly torag plate 4764 = ghostly torag hammers 16043 = butters robe top 15044 = butters robe bottom 15962 = santas robe top 15963 = santas robe bottom 15968 = gilded robe top 15969 = gilded robe bottom 15009 = green platelegs 15010 = green shield 15011 = green gauntlets 15012 = green botts 13776 = lunar helm 17001 = master strength cape 17002 = master hunter cape 17003 = master attack cape 17004 = master cooking cape 17005 = master defence cape 15083 = owners platelegs 15084 = owner boots 15956 = blue boots 15957 = elf boots 15932 = gilded bandos chestplate 16031 = bandos blackchest 15939 = lemonlime chestplate 15949 = green brassy 15970 = dragon brassard 15950 = elf's brassard 15951 = blue brassard 15086 = owners crown 16038 = angel wings 11334 = sniper rifle 11335 = rocket launcher 11337 = plasma rifle 11333 = tri-godsword 11339 = saradomin godsword(dual) 11336 = guthix godsword 11330 = car 11329 = butters car 11331 = god dagger 11338 = energy sword 16039 = dragon kiteshield 16040 = fancy shirt 16041 = dmeon wings 15085 = owners kiteshield 15928 = michigan platelegs 15929 = jet's platelegs 13777 = lunar torso 13778 = lunar legs 13779 = lunar gauntlets 13780 = lunar boots 13781 = lunar cape 13674 = lunar staff 15087 = guthans ghostly legs 15088 = guthans ghostly helm 11328 = halo helmet 15089 = guthans ghostly platebody

going to post download link, as well as pictures, once i finish it. so you’re problay going to post bad comments, but you’ll like it with pic’s, i’ll release it by tommrow :))))))

item.title: *~^ButterScape v3 95%!^~*
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You may have left it called(is that even proper grammar?) butterscape, but the fact is, unless you change the name, the newer people to this community(and all the others) will believe that you were the creator of Butterscape, because you’re releasing v3, and if someone is releasing a v3, basic human assumption will lead them to believe that you were the original creator. Potentially causing a huge flame fest of who is the original creator. So why not change the name, to avoid all that bs?

Read full topic

I wanted you to change the name from Butterscape -.-

item.title: *~^ButterScape v3 95%!^~*
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:17, topic:287952”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=380709.msg2862947#msg2862947 date=1247280299]

It doesn’t matter if cocoa is rarely on. If you’re “recreating” a server, that he made, and releasing it, you MUST have his permission. You must also have pictures to post in the development thread.

Cocoa is on every day. He also approves this if you’re ACTUALLY gonna work on it, not just post and then leave.

@ModAssassin, You also don’t get 60%

I didn’t mean that you weren’n on everyday. I was just saying that even if you weren’t on everyday, it still doesn’t give him the right to take your server name.
[/quote]

Right, I don’t want him using the name. He’ll be like. I’m the owner of Butterscape and people will tell me I’m not and I’ll have to say “ffs, he’s a leecher” because he probably has done anything. No pics no proof.

[/quote]

i didn’t put my name all over it. in fact, i left it called butterscape.

Read full topic
